description:
Keep track of where you're spending your money — the easy way!

With just three taps, you can enter your monthly budget and begin tracking your expenses immediately. Money features a beautiful designed and extremely simple interface which integrates well with your overall device experience , that allows you to record purchases in seconds. You can then view your daily receipts or head to the This month page to find out how you are doing so far this month, along with your top expenses and other stats.

Save money, be mindful of your spending, & have fun doing it.

Features
-Simple & attractive interface
-Recording a purchase takes seconds
-Built in expenses categories
-See how you are doing on your budget
-Store every transaction you make

Supports $. Support for more currencies will be available in a 1.0.1 update shortly(maybe a week at most).
versionNote:
Major bug fix release-
-fixes bug which make rollover of expenses to next month, which is fixed now.
-UI rehash to better support HP Veer.
-A new Top expenses view which shows top expenses this month.
